alert.note: Alert for Catoosa (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Catoosa, northwestern Walker and Dade Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Morganville, or near Trenton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ringgold, Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Lookout Mountain, Lakeview, Indian Springs, Graysville, Blue Spring, Cole City, Wildwood, Fairview, Stephensville, Boynton, Beaumont, Chattanooga Valley, New England, Morganville and Hooker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
